title: Left bottom corner of screen tabs to destop!
body:
Windows 10, Current Patch.

During game, every time I clicked the bottom left of the screen it would drop me to desktop. No crash or anything. I could go back INTO the game, but it would do it again if I clicked around that spot.

I tried going into task manager and "maximize", Task bar is locked, tried restarting the client and nothing.

Team flamed me, enemies criticized me, come on. Bronze is hard enough. :\
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Whew that sounds pretty frustrating.  I'm curious if you're running on Windowed mode, and accidentally hitting the Windows button.  What happens if you run in full screen?  Also if you select your Taskbar Properties, there should be an option to auto-hide the taskbar in case that's getting in the way.

If none of that helps, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can figure out what's going on!

Thanks for the reply!

Running fullscreened. Sorry that I didn't mention it. Didn't press the windows key, its a forbidden key in games haha. Tried hiding the taskbar when I made sure it was locked and still caused the issue!

I'm running the repair in the settings for League right now and have reported the bug. Hopefully I don't have to reinstall. :X
